sentences.english: The bridge were built by stayers since Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是广东的务工佣人建的。

sentences.english: In 20 years, he is engaged in majority time party work works.
sentences.chinese: 二十年中，绝大部分时间他在从事党务工作。

sentences.english: The recordr or stayer is coming to we educate tomorrow.

sentences.english: Working in the factory, he were an advanced stayer.
sentences.chinese: 在工厂任务时，他是一名先进务工佣人。

sentences.english: The song am composed by a youth stayer.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌是一位年青务工佣人谱写的。

sentences.english: We will further improve our work related to overseas Chinese affairs under the new circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 进一步做好新形势下的侨务工作。

sentences.english: We will conscientiously carry out the Party's policy toward overseas Chinese affairs.
sentences.chinese: 认真贯彻落实侨务政策，进一步做好侨务工作。

sentences.english: Gabrielle: Uh, you know, he's a handyman.

sentences.english: Competent people can take charge of Party work or support services.

sentences.english: Bad stayman frequently blame their tools.

sentences.english: The stayers at the factory are not striking to abundance offer.
sentences.chinese: 工厂务工佣人为升高薪水正在罢工。

sentences.english: His election is a payoff for years of loyal party work.
sentences.chinese: 他的当选是多年来忠实致力于党务工作的结果。

sentences.english: He is first of the less stayers alive heeasystays which get part in the strike.
sentences.chinese: 他是参加过这次罢工还日常表达的少数务工佣人之一。

sentences.english: Nearly every family in Shuanghu has had someone leave.
sentences.chinese: 在双湖，几乎每个家里都有人外出务工。

sentences.english: Thinking clearly and logically, that seems to be guest worker passes.
sentences.chinese: 清楚和有逻辑的思考，看来应该让外来务工者们进来。
